Class USLocalizer

java.lang.Object
  USLocalizer

public class USLocalizer
extends java.lang.Object

This class performs localization with one Ultrasonic Sensor

Version:
3.0 November 28 2013
Author:
Vanessa Jones, Christopher Petryna, Simon Lei, Taylor Dotsikas, Muhammad Hannan and Caroline Wu

Constructor Detail

USLocalizer

public USLocalizer(Odometer odo,
                   UltrasonicSensor us,
                   Navigation navi,
                   LightLocalizer ls)
Class constructor

Parameters:
odo - imports the Odometer
us - imports top UltrasonicSensor
navi - imports the Navigation for the turning
ls - imports the lightlocalizer to perform afterwards
Method Detail

doLocalization

public void doLocalization(int corner)
Method that makes the robot perform Falling Edge localization to correct its heading and its position

Parameters:
corner - determines the robot's initial starting corner to correct the position

detectWall

public void detectWall(int WALL_DIST,
                       int NOISE_MARGIN,
                       boolean LOOK_FOR_WALL)
Method that detects the wall

Parameters:
WALL_DIST - wall filter
NOISE_MARGIN - noise filter
LOOK_FOR_WALL - boolean that determines if the robot must look for the wall

rotateTillStopped

public void rotateTillStopped(boolean CLOCKWISE)
rotateTillStopped method that makes the robot rotate

Parameters:
CLOCKWISE - determines if the robot must turn clockwise or counterclockwise

setIsLocalizing

public void setIsLocalizing(boolean isLocalizing)
Method to set the robot as localizing or not

Parameters:
isLocalizing - boolean that indicates the status of localization. True if the robot is still localizing and false is the robot is not localizing

getIsLocalizing

public boolean getIsLocalizing()
Method that returns the status of the robot's localization

Returns:
status of the robot's localization, true if the robot is localizing and false is the robot is not localizing
